articles.description: As per the circulars issued by the BSE and the National Stock Exchange (NSE), both the bourses will exclude the securities of Adani Enterprises from the short-term ASM framework effective from June 2.
articles.content: Adani Enterprises, the flagship company of the Adani Group, will move out of the short-term additional surveillance measure (ASM) framework from Friday. As per the circulars issued by the BSE and the… [+1712 chars]
